SNYK-PYTHON-TRANSFORMERS-6220003.description:
## Overview
[transformers](https://pypi.org/project/transformers) is a State-of-the-art Machine Learning for JAX, PyTorch and TensorFlow

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Command Injection via the `subprocess.Popen` calls. This could potentially allow for the execution of arbitrary code.


**Note:**
It appears that while this issue is generally not critical for the library's primary use cases, it can become more significant in specific production environments. 
Particularly in scenarios where the library interacts with user-generated input, such as in web application backends, desktop applications, and cloud-based ML services, the risk of arbitrary code execution increases.
## Remediation
Upgrade `transformers` to version 4.37.0 or higher.
## References
- [Additional Information](https://bandit.readthedocs.io/en/1.7.6/plugins/b602_subprocess_popen_with_shell_equals_true.html)
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/commit/2272ab57a99bcac972b5252b87c31e24d0b25538)
